thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Melissa Samanian

author: Melissa Samanian
title: Melissa Samanian
text: Urgently had to send out a few bouquets across Sydney metro areas by a certain time. Couriers were flat out and could not assist. So I tried Airtasker and found someone who could assist me. It was a very easy process. The person I gave the jobs to was professional, friendly and kept me updated on each delivery. I was very happy and would use Airtasker again.
